attribs.name: proficiencies
attribs.current:
Armor: Light armor
Weapons: Simple weapons, hand crossbows, longswords, rapiers, shortswords
Tools: Thieves' tools, Pachisi

attribs.name: class_features_turned_on
attribs.current: EXPERTISE SNEAK_ATTACK THIEVES_CANT CUNNING_ACTION UNCANNY_DODGE EVASION

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KnRPZVGi8lxnnHp0gjl_content
attribs.current:
Choose two of your skill proficiencies, or one of your skill proficiencies and your proficiency with thieves' tools. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of the chosen proficiencies.
At 6th level, you can choose two more of your proficiencies (in skills or with thieves' tools) to gain this benefit.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KnRPZVHiTdyNJO3Caii_content
attribs.current:
You know how to strike subtly and exploit a foe's distraction. Once per turn, you can deal extra damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll. The attack must use a finesse or a ranged weapon.
You don't need advantage on the attack roll if another enemy of the target is within 5 feet of it, that enemy isn't incapacitated, and you don't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KnRPZVHiTdyNJO3Caij_content
attribs.current:
During your rogue training you learned thieves' cant, a secret mix of dialect, jargon, and code that allows you tohide messages in seemingly normal conversation. Only another creature that knows thieves' cant understands such messages. It takes four times longer to convey such a message than it does to speak the same idea plainly.
In addition, you understand a set of secret signs and symbols used to convey short, simple messages, such as whether an area is dangerous or the territory of a thieves' guild, whether loot is nearby, or whether the people in an area are easy marks or will provide a safe house for thieves onthe run.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current:
Antisocial Personality Disorder

I always have a plan for what to do when things go wrong.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: Chains are meant to be broken, as are those who would forge them.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: Something important was taken from me, and I aim to steal it back.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: When faced with a choice between money and my friends, I usually choose the money.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KnRYieGPywTXop-DEtt_content
attribs.current: Your quick thinking and agility allow you to move and act quickly. You can take a bonus action on each of your turns in combat. This action can be used only to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KnRYieNTi0dcEDRWQPv_content
attribs.current: When an attacker that you can see hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to halve the attack's damage against you

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KnRYieUYH2nF7eW-AZV_content
attribs.current: Your instinctive agility lets you dodge out of the way of certain area effects, such as a blue dragon's lightning breath or a fireball spell. When you are subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if you fail.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KnRZFU2AU0z5i6WgfD2_content
attribs.current: Disarm trap or pick lock with cunning action
